version_description: Thanks for downloading – with the lastminute.com app you’ll always have our great deals at your fingertips. Every now and then we’ll release updates, these are designed to improve your booking experience. They may also include a new feature; we’ll keep you informed about these.

Thanks for downloading – with the lastminute.com app you’ll always have our great deals at your fingertips. Every now and then we’ll release updates, these are designed to improve your booking experience. They may also include a new feature; we’ll keep you informed about these.

Managing your booking is simpler than ever!
Now you can log in to see and manage your booking directly within the app. Need to change your flight? No problem, you can log in any time up to 24 hours before your departure and change your flight booking. We’ll help take the hassle out of everything by offering you a hand-picked selection of the most suitable alternatives, which you can easily choose from.

Now you can log in to see and manage your booking directly within the app. Need to change your flight? No problem, you can log in any time up to 24 hours before your departure and change your flight booking. We’ll help take the hassle out of everything by offering you a hand-picked selection of the most suitable alternatives, which you can easily choose from.

Thanks for downloading – with the lastminute.com app you’ll always have our great deals at your fingertips. Every now and then we’ll release updates, these are designed to improve your booking experience. They may also include a new feature; we’ll keep you informed about these.
We’ve added more products for you to explore. You can now search and book a hotel and flight together from within the app.

Thanks for downloading – with the lastminute.com app you’ll always have our great deals at your fingertips. Every now and then we’ll release updates, these are designed to improve your booking experience. They may also include a new feature; we’ll keep you informed about these.

We’ve added some great features in our app:
*Booked a flight with us? Now you can see your boarding pass in the app.
*Poor internet connection abroad? View everything about your booking offline.
*We have even more products to offer you. Search and book car hire from within the app.
*New and improved menu design that’ll help you find what you want more easily.

Keep appdated and you'll be ready to enjoy all the new features we've added to our app.
For example, you'll now be able to check the status of your reservations, and find all the info you'll need about products you've booked, even more easily, thanks to our new Trip Timeline function.
Want to know more?
Download the new lastminute.com app today to find out.

Hey you! In the latest version of the app, we’ve made flight check-in much, much easier.
Now you don’t have to wait for check-in to open: you can do it whenever you want. And we'll send your boarding passes straight to the app.

From now on, enjoy:

No more queues at the airport
No more worrying about forgetting to check-in
Finding your boarding passes exactly where you need them.

Get it all, when you update the app.

Hey you! In the latest version of the app, we’ve made flight check-in much, much easier.
Now you don’t have to wait for check-in to open: you can do it whenever you want. And we'll send your boarding passes straight to the app.
From now on, enjoy:

No more queues at the airport
No more worrying about forgetting to check-in
Finding your boarding passes exactly where you need them.

Get it all, when you update the app.
Bug fix on Web Check In

Is summer really over? Better get some travelling in before the days start becoming shorter.

We've made it even easier for you to do so too, with a new improved flight search that's even easier to use.

See you up in the sky!

Get your mobile boarding pass directly on your phone.

Now with our app you can get and store your mobile boarding passes on your phone for even faster and easier access - even when you don't have an internet connection.

Say goodbye to airport queues and printers!

There’s a new app in town. And it’s been made with you, the traveller, in mind.

Designed to inspire you and feed your wanderlust, we want to make booking a breeze - whether you’re looking for flights, hotels or flight + hotel packages.

What’s new?
We’ve given the app a new sleeker and more streamlined appearance, to help simplify the booking experience. Among the new features and improvements are:
- New homepage design
- Improved search functionalities
- Updated account management
- Removed bottom navigation bar

And this is just the beginning! We’re busy at work making your app experience even better. Stay tuned for more updates, coming very soon.

What's new?
1. When accessing the Need help feature you’ll now be redirected to a browser. We found out that this view wasn’t always loading correctly before.
2. Past bookings are now always available to view in the Bookings area.
3. Opened the app at night yet? We have a surprise for you in the homeview.

Whats new?
* Need help is new! Now you have direct links to all main products and if you can’t find an answer to your question there is a new feature “Booking queries”.

What’s fixed?
* Improvements on the behaviour and colours of the top nav bar

What's new?
- "Share feedback" - Let us know if there's a feature you'd love to have, if you found a bug or just want to drop us a line.
- "Booking queries" - Now is available in English, Italian, Spanish, German, French and Portuguese.

What's improved?
- We've reviewed and improved the copy on all alerts when searching for hotels

What's improved?
- We've made a few small improvements and fixes. So now your app experience will be even better!

What's new?
- There's a new alert design, less intrusive and more informative
- refresh on the sign in page by unifying the style of all the buttons

What's fixed?
- "Manage emails" menu is now working!

What's new?
- New night video!

What's fixed?
- We've made a few improvements and fixes. So now your app experience will be even better!

What's improved?
- We tweaked the blue color from informative alerts to create better contrast, and improved the icon that comes with it.

What's new?
- Getaways! A new feature where we will share with you the cheapest flights of the day.
- Have a look at the new calendar!

What's improved?
- After sign in you were redirected to the homeview, not anymore.

What's improved?
- Travellers picker - We aligned the top bar with the rest of the app. It's white now.
- New icon for important messages
- Fixed logic and behaviour on the new calendar

What's new?
- Calendar - Now you can see if there are direct flights for some routes.

What's improved?
- Getaways - When selecting the country of origin, you can tap on the dark area to dismiss the modal.

What's new?
- Our origin and destination pickers have a completely new design! What do you think?

What's improved?
- Allignment on the Title of pages font size.
- Improvement of the side margins in the nav icons.

What's new?
- All search pickers are now visually aliggned and we added the feature to use current location when choosing the origin.

What's improved?
- the behaviour of error messages
- minor ui fixes

What's improved?
- We improved the performance and behaviour of the feature Direct flights inside the calendar

What's new?
- Summer video!
- Did you check the Nearby Places new feature already?
- We've also refreshed some of our illustrations
Business as usual. To improve your experience we've successfully invited some bugs out of the app and made performance improvements.
